title: The Demon Wars: Prequel
description: Join Ulagret, a shy craftsman who has been forced by circumstances to fight against one of the great arch demons that threatens to tear the world of Evorath apart. With only a small army on his side, he must break through his own insecurity to become the hero that his people need. In this prequel to the first novel in his Evorath series, author Joseph Macolino introduces readers to the early foundation of the world and one of the most turbulent trials the people of Evorath had to face. In this brief novella, readers witness an exciting battle that will steer the course of elvish history. As an added bonus, this eBook also contains the first four chapters of "The Birth of Death," the first novel in the Legacy of Evorath epic fantasy universe.
author: Joseph P. Macolino
